Package com.thalesgroup.gemalto.d1.card

Interface ECommerceTokenService

public interface ECommerceTokenService
Service interface for e-commerce token operations.

Provides functionality for approving device binding and unbinding devices for e-commerce tokens.

Since:
4.3.0

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    ECommerceTokenService.BindingApprovalReason
    The reason associated with approving a device binding for an e-commerce token.
    static enum 
    ECommerceTokenService.UnbindReason
    The reason associated with unbinding a device from an e-commerce token.

  • Method Details

    • approveDeviceBinding

      void approveDeviceBinding(@NonNull String digitalCardID, @NonNull String bindingReference, @Nullable ECommerceTokenService.BindingApprovalReason reason, @NonNull D1Task.Callback<Void> callback)
      Approves device binding for an e-commerce token.

      This method is used to approve the binding of a device to a digital card.

      Parameters:
      digitalCardID - The unique identifier of the digital card
      bindingReference - Corresponds to Visa device index
      reason - The reason for device binding approval. If not provided, defaults to ECommerceTokenService.BindingApprovalReason.ISSUER_DECISION.
      callback - The callback for the result. When successful, the returned argument of D1Task.Callback.onSuccess(Object) is always null.
      Possible errors:
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_NOT_LOGGED_IN
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_NOT_AUTHORIZED
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_DEVICE_ENVIRONMENT_UNSAFE
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CORE
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CARD_NOT_FOUND
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CARD
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT
      Since:
      4.3.0

    • unbindDevice

      void unbindDevice(@NonNull String digitalCardID, @NonNull String bindingReference, @Nullable ECommerceTokenService.UnbindReason reasonCode, @NonNull D1Task.Callback<Void> callback)
      Unbinds a device from an e-commerce token.

      This method is used to remove the binding of a device from a digital card.

      Parameters:
      digitalCardID - The unique identifier of the digital card
      bindingReference - Corresponds to Visa device index
      reasonCode - The reason for device unbinding. If not provided, defaults to ECommerceTokenService.UnbindReason.ISSUER_DECISION.
      callback - The callback for the result. When successful, the returned argument of D1Task.Callback.onSuccess(Object) is always null.
      Possible errors:
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_NOT_LOGGED_IN
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_NOT_AUTHORIZED
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_DEVICE_ENVIRONMENT_UNSAFE
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CORE
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CARD_NOT_FOUND
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CARD
      • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT
      Since:
      4.3.0
